You then feel yourself thrown across the room while tangles in the fabric. The same voice then says "Damn it! I'm out of clean underwear. Guess I'll wear yesterday's." You are then pulled up and you see a bright light as your eyes focus, you realize you have somehow you have been shrunk and you are in your..
